text: Ioannis Sarmas (; born 21 March 1957) is a Greek judge and politician. He was the caretaker Prime Minister of Greece from May 2023 to June 2023. He is the chairman of the Greek Court of Audit since 4 November 2019. President Katerina Sakellaropoulou picked him to be the caretaker Prime Minister of Greece on 25 May 2023. He leaved office on 26 June 2023. ==References== Category:1957 births Category:Living people Category:Prime ministers of Greece Category:Greek judges
title: Ioannis Sarmas
